row.process: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target OS" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TARGET_OS_DIS_ARCH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HOSTNAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_USERNAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Remote Protocol" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_REMOTE_PROTOCOL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Remote Port" :IF &UC4RB_REMOTE_PORT# <> 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_REMOTE_PORT#" :ELSE :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "<Using Default Port>" :ENDIF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sudo Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
